name: oblivious
caption: Oblivious

effect.full:
This Pokémon cannot be [infatuated]{mechanic:infatuation} and is immune to []{move:captivate}.

If a Pokémon is infatuated and acquires this ability, its infatuation is cleared.

flavorText:
The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from
being infatuated or falling for taunts.
